commentData.description: Returns the ModelFile that defines this class.

method.name: _resolveSuperType

commentData.description: Resolve the super type on this class and store it as an internal property.

tags.description: The super type, or null if non specified.

The super type, or null if non specified.

method.name: getSystemType

commentData.description:
Returns the base system type for this type of class declaration. Override
this method in derived classes to specify a base system type.

tags.title: return
tags.description: the short name of the base system type or null

description: Returns the base system type for this type of class declaration. Override this method in derived classes to specify a base system type.
the short name of the base system type or null

method.summary: Returns the base system type for this type of class declaration

tags.description: true if the class is abstract

method.name: isSystemCoreType

commentData.description:

namespace, and also one of the system core types (Asset, Participant, etc).

method.name: getName

commentData.description:
Returns the short name of a class. This name does not include the
namespace from the owning ModelFile.

tags.title: return
tags.description: the short name of this class

description: Returns the short name of a class. This name does not include the namespace from the owning ModelFile.
the short name of this class

method.summary: Returns the short name of a class

commentData.description: Return the namespace of this class.

tags.title: return
tags.description: namespace - a namespace.

description: Return the namespace of this class.
namespace - a namespace.

method.name: getFullyQualifiedName

commentData.description:
Returns the fully qualified name of this class.
The name will include the namespace if present.

tags.title: return
tags.description: the fully-qualified name of this class

description: Returns the fully qualified name of this class. The name will include the namespace if present.
the fully-qualified name of this class

method.summary: Returns the fully qualified name of this class

method.name: getIdentifierFieldName

commentData.description:
Returns the name of the identifying field for this class. Note
that the identifying field may come from a super type.

tags.title: return
tags.description: the name of the id field for this class

description: Returns the name of the identifying field for this class. Note that the identifying field may come from a super type.
the name of the id field for this class

method.summary: Returns the name of the identifying field for this class

method.name: getOwnProperty

commentData.description:
Returns the field with a given name or null if it does not exist.
The field must be directly owned by this class -- the super-type is
not introspected.

tags.title: param
tags.description: the name of the field
tags.name: name

tags.title: return
tags.description: the field definition or null if it does not exist.

description: Returns the field with a given name or null if it does not exist. The field must be directly owned by this class -- the super-type is not introspected.
the field definition or null if it does not exist.

method.summary: Returns the field with a given name or null if it does not exist

method.name: getOwnProperties

commentData.description: Returns the fields directly defined by this class.

tags.title: return
tags.description: the array of fields

description: Returns the fields directly defined by this class.
the array of fields

method.summary: Returns the fields directly defined by this class

method.name: getSuperType

commentData.description:

method.name: getProperty

commentData.description:
Returns the property with a given name or null if it does not exist.
Fields defined in super-types are also introspected.

tags.title: param
tags.description: the name of the field
tags.name: name

tags.title: return
tags.description: the field, or null if it does not exist

description: Returns the property with a given name or null if it does not exist. Fields defined in super-types are also introspected.
the field, or null if it does not exist

method.summary: Returns the property with a given name or null if it does not exist

commentData.description: Returns the properties defined in this class and all super classes.

tags.description: the array of fields

description: Returns the properties defined in this class and all super classes.
the array of fields

tags.title: throws
tags.description: if the property path is invalid or the property does not exist
